title: Impact of Coworking Spaces on Social Wellbeing Indicators
name: Impact of Coworking Spaces on Social Wellbeing Indicators
description: Analyze the relationship between the proximity of coworking spaces and various social wellbeing indicators, such as mental health, community engagement, and access to support services. Assess how accessibility to coworking spaces influences individual and community wellbeing, and provide insights into optimizing coworking space locations for enhanced social outcomes.
